about_the_game:
"

FG Eastern Buildings Map Pack


The Eastern Buildings Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package consists of images for the creation of classic eastern-style buildings. This pack includes the following items:

  • Brushes include walls, fences, bridges, roof elements, and more
  • Decorations include buildings, lanterns, lampposts, columns, foliage, construction elements, and more
  • Fills of stone floors, wooden floors, and classic eastern roof shingles 
"
detailed_description:
"

FG Eastern Buildings Map Pack


The Eastern Buildings Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package consists of images for the creation of classic eastern-style buildings. This pack includes the following items:

  • Brushes include walls, fences, bridges, roof elements, and more
  • Decorations include buildings, lanterns, lampposts, columns, foliage, construction elements, and more
  • Fills of stone floors, wooden floors, and classic eastern roof shingles 
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
